note:
Old Nerd. My first personal computer was a Commodore 64. Love Open Source & Linux.

I first joined Mastodon years before the great exodus from the bird site. Alas, my admin hosed our instance May '24 during a server migration (sys admins: don't forget to back up your pg database separately, without it, your server's identity is gone!).

I enjoy lighthearted and heavy topics, politics and nature, travel and tinkering at home, and humor. Mine is dark and twisted.
